root.email_subject: We have received your payment for order No. 1000109
root.email_text:
Order Confirmation from Doreenbeads
1994
Thanks for shopping with us! You have made the payment successfully, and we will arrange your order’s packaging and shipment ASAP. The following are the details of your order. ------------------------------------------------------ Order Number: 1000109 Date Ordered: Friday 17 April, 2020 Detailed Invoice: http://www.doreenbeadslocal.com/index.php?main_page=account_history_info&order_id=1000109
Products ------------------------------------------------------ ------------------------------------------------------
Delivery Address ------------------------------------------------------ h m PO Box 573 Clinton, OK 73601 United States 15225103787Tel:15225103787
Important note about Delivery Address: Please make sure that above Delivery Address is correct. Normally upon receiving your payment, we will dispatch your parcel quickly. Therefore if you find this address is incorrect, please contact us within 24 hours.Payment Method ------------------------------------------------------ PayPal
----- This email address was given to us by you or by one of our customers. If you feel that you have received this email in error, please send an email to sale@doreenbeads.com
----- Copyright (c) 2020 DoreenBeads.com. Powered by DoreenBeads
This email is sent in accordance with the US CAN-SPAM Law in effect 01/01/2004. Removal requests can be sent to this address and will be honored and respected.
root.email_html:
Payment Confirmation from Doreenbeads

1994 ,
    Thanks for shopping with us! You have made the payment successfully, and we will arrange your order’s packaging and shipment ASAP.

We will ship your parcel to the following shipping address :
Delivery Address
h m
PO Box 573
Clinton, OK 73601
United States
15225103787Tel:15225103787
Please kindly have a check to see if there is any wrong information. If you want to correct shipping address, please email us: sale@doreenbeads.com before we ship your parcel out.

Hope to do more kind business with you. Have a lovely day there~~

Best regards,

Doreenbeads Team
This email address was given to us by you or by one of our customers. If you feel that you have received this email in error, please send an email to sale@doreenbeads.com
